name: Round and Round and Round
description:
This game was made for Ludum Dare 47. The theme was "Stuck in a loop".

Belzeebub was feeling peckish so he decided to step out from hell and picked your world as his snack! Unfortunately, you’re too weak to face him, but you don’t want to die yet. Only one solution remains: fleeing… forever… and ever… and ever…

I wasn’t super thrilled by my idea so I couldn’t gather much motivation, which means I slacked, which means I didn’t make it in time for the compo unfortunately. Oh well!

Also, my apologies for the serious case of programmer art.

Made with Godot.

FAQ

Why are the slimes so eager to be eaten?
The slimes move in mysterious ways.

By the way, why do I seem to be the only one of my specy? Why are all the other ones slimes?
The Creator moves in... uh... unoriginal, hasty ways? And He's not great at drawing either? And He didn't have much time anyway, only 72 hours! Give me... er, Him a break!
